verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tazameni kule Kalvari,
Mwokozi aliteswa na dhambi,
Alizikwa kule kaburini,
mwisho alitoka kwa ushindi.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nitashinda Bwana nitashinda,
Kama wewe pia ulishinda,
Nitapitia mapitoni mwako,
Nitaanza Bwana nitashinda.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Njia mbovu zote nimeacha,
nitapitia njia nyembamba,
walipita Eliya na Musa,
walianza Bwana, wakashinda.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Kupokea nyimbo za ushindi,
ziliinunuliwa kwa mawingu,
malaika wote wanaimba,
wanasifu nyimbo za ushindi.
